name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Robert ZUKOWSKI, Sr., Appellee

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and GREENSPAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Robert ZUKOWSKI, Sr., Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of December, 2008, the Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is REVERSED pursuant to Commonwealth v. Lee, 594 Pa. 266, 935 A.2d 865 (2007), and the matter is remanded for proceedings consistent with that opinion.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Karl Baker, Esq., Defender Association of Philadelphia, for Robert Zukowski, Sr.
casebody.head_matter:
961 A.2d 79
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Robert ZUKOWSKI, Sr., Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 17, 2008.
Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Karl Baker, Esq., Defender Association of Philadelphia, for Robert Zukowski, Sr.
BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and GREENSPAN, JJ.
